item.title: Use meaningful URLs
item.description: QR codes are stupid. See the well-known flowchart. And I don’t like Drupal. Sites that use it give things URLs like http://www.genetics.wisc.edu/node/577 for their seminar list. And can we get rid of the www? "What's your web site?" "double-u double-u double-u ..." "Zzz..." URLs should be meaningful and short. I like deep hierarchies of folders, but it makes for long URLs. URL-shorteners help, but you don’t really want to read out (or type) one of those short URLs.
